extension.news: v1.0.5 (2024-05-11) - Changed URL's to new ziggo server - Adjusted authentication according to new server - Adjusted recording api to new server - Individual recording of shows cannot be deleted anymore due to changed ziggo api - Small modifications to EPG-screen - ISA: manifest_type no longer set, header in manifest response now set cfm wiki
v1.0.11 (2024-09-27) - Fixed issue with switching to other channel without stopping it - Implement fall-back to lower-resolution when outside ziggo network
v1.0.12 (2024-11-09) - Fixed issue with list of recordings when adult is allowed - Fixed issue with return to previous list for recordings
v1.0.13 (2024-11-10) - Fixed setting of title when 'title' is absent
